Duration: I would use my power to control time to make sure that I have enough time to complete tasks that require a lot of focus and attention to detail. For example, if I am working on a project that requires me to research and gather information, I would use my power to slow down time so that I have more time to carefully read and analyze the information.

Gusto: I would use my power to control time to make sure that I have enough time to pursue activities that I am passionate about. For example, if I love to paint, I would use my power to slow down time so that I can spend more time creating beautiful art.
